content: Soaks can't be upgraded in the game, unlike the Drinks and the Gourd itself, so you are stuck with the length of this damage reduction. It can't be increased, so, if you want to switch to a different Soak, be sure to head back to the Shen Monkey Vendor.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Laurel_Buds.md', within the main section titled 'Laurel Buds'.
The content is as follows:
Soaks can't be upgraded in the game, unlike the Drinks and the Gourd itself, so you are stuck with the length of this damage reduction. It can't be increased, so, if you want to switch to a different Soak, be sure to head back to the Shen Monkey Vendor.
